trans-unit.source: The location of an XML node in a file.
trans-unit.target: 在文件中的 XML 节点位置。

trans-unit.source: Any editing of the project XML through the MSBuild API's will invalidate locations in that XML until the XML is reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 项目的任何编辑通过 MSBuild API 的 XML 将使该 XML 中的位置之前重新加载 XML。

trans-unit.source: This object is IMMUTABLE, so that it can be passed around arbitrarily.
trans-unit.target: 此对象是不可变，以便它可以任意传递周围。

trans-unit.source: DO NOT make these objects any larger.
trans-unit.target: 不要使这些对象的任何更大。

trans-unit.source: There are huge numbers of them and they are transmitted between nodes.
trans-unit.target: 有大量的它们，并且它们节点之间传输。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The column number where this element exists in its file.
trans-unit.target: 此元素位于其文件列号。

trans-unit.source: The first column is numbered 1.
trans-unit.target: 第一列是编号为的 1。

trans-unit.source: Zero indicates "unknown location".
trans-unit.target: 零表示"未知的位置"。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Override Equals so that identical fields imply equal objects.
trans-unit.target: 重写 Equals 方法，以便完全相同的字段表示相等的对象。

trans-unit.source: The element location to compare to this element location.
trans-unit.target: 要与此元素位置进行比较的元素位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对象相等; 否则为返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The file from which this particular element originated.
trans-unit.target: 此特定的元素所源自的文件。

trans-unit.source: It may differ from the ProjectFile if, for instance, it was part of an import or originated in a targets file.
trans-unit.target: 如果，例如，它已导入的一部分或产生的目标文件中可能不同于 ProjectFile。

trans-unit.source: If not known, returns empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果未知，则返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Get reasonable hash code.
trans-unit.target: 获取合理的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The line number where this element exists in its file.
trans-unit.target: 此元素位于其文件行号。

trans-unit.source: The first line is numbered 1.
trans-unit.target: 第一行是编号为的 1。

trans-unit.source: Zero indicates "unknown location".
trans-unit.target: 零表示"未知的位置"。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Location of element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>
